sourcesContent:
import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function CakeDetail(){ let [cakedetails,setCakedetails] = useState({}) let params =useParams() useEffect(()=>{ let cakedetailapiurl="https://apibyashu.herokuapp.com/api/cake/"+params.cakeid axios({ method:'get', url:cakedetailapiurl, }).then((response)=>{ setCakedetails(response.data.data) },(error)=>{ console.log("Error:-",error) }) }) return(
{cakedetails.name}

cakedetails.description

CURRENT PRICE :

91% of buyers enjoyed this product (87 votes)

Weight: 3KG

FLAVOUR :

TYPE
GENERAL
) } export default CakeDetail
